statements: UPDATE inventory_management SET component_quantity = 10 WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_management SET component_name = 'Wheels', manufacturer = 'RobotCo' WHERE robot_name = 'R2D2';
UPDATE inventory_management SET component_quantity = component_quantity + 10, manufacturer = 'ABC Company' WHERE robot_id = 1001;
UPDATE inventory_management SET component_quantity = 50, production_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE robot_name = 'Android Bot';
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity - 10 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE SupplyChain SET delivery_status = 'Delivered' WHERE supplier_id = 201
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 100, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE SupplyChain SET delivery_status = 'Delivered' WHERE supplier_id = 3;
UPDATE robots SET model='R2D2' WHERE name='Robot1';
UPDATE parts SET price=25.99 WHERE category='Electronic';
UPDATE robots SET name='R2-D2', manufacturer='Lucasfilm' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE parts SET price=799.99, category='Electronics' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE robots SET robot_type = 'Android' WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE components SET cost = 200.50 WHERE component_id = 3;
UPDATE robots SET manufacturing_date = '2022-04-15', robot_type = 'Helper' WHERE robot_id = 5;
UPDATE components SET supplier_id = 10, cost = 1200.25 WHERE component_name = 'Arm' AND cost < 1000;
UPDATE Robots SET manufacturer = 'RoboTech', production_year = 2022 WHERE r_id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET quantity_ordered = 50, order_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE o_id = 3;
UPDATE Robots SET manufacturer = 'RoboCorp', production_year = 2022 WHERE r_id = 1;
UPDATE Parts SET quantity_in_stock = quantity_in_stock - 10, unit_price = unit_price * 1.1 WHERE part_name LIKE 'Screw%' AND quantity_in_stock > 0;
